MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the CH3 and CH4 postcode areas of Chester is still ongoing. This is due to difficulties on site and we now expect power to be back on by 5PM.  We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.26PM on 10th March 2021.
